text_block_list.text:
One day, Sakura Bakushin O was training
to further improve her speed in order
to win by a large margin over Nishino
Flower…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Trainer! 
Bench press has been completed!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
There is no need for a break! 
I can still keep going!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
So, please do send over your next muscle 
training…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ahh! That gaze!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hyaaaah! I was quite startled!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
What's the matter, you two? 
You're just staaaaring at me.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
However, I can see why you'd be so 
enamored with my hard work!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ha! 
So, you're studying me as a rival!?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Well, I thought Ms. Bakushin O was
working really hard, so I…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I see! I knew you were here to
compliment me. Thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
But this kind of training is only
natural if you're trying to achieve
speed.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
A high-impact workout that efficiently 
trains muscle reflexes…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I've concluded that you are making the 
shortest possible effort to becoming a 
short-distance champion.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Short-distance champion!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: No, I didn't plan on――

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
In short distance races, Ms. Bakushin O 
gets a lot of great results… 
It's, truly amazing.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Um, well, we're all rooting for you, so… 
Keep it up, okay!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I know why we're doing this!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It's all so that I can work on my speed
and make myself a winner on the Bakushin
Road.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Right??

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Yes, of course I am! 
So, affirmative, all is well.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'm not suspicious at all, I'm not
thinking "Am I really being made into a
sprinter!?" or anything at all, so don't
you worry!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'm not even thinking, "I haven't run 
in the same race as Ms. Rice and her 
friends in a while…"!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Come on, let's keep training! 
To win every exemplary race there is!!

…Right, it's all about winning. 
She's not wrong. 
……That's the idea!!
